pages.text: Augmentation is one of the most powerful features of the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$(). Apply powerful enchantments to Jewelry, Totems, and many other types of Equipment.

amethyst_imbuement:augmenter.text: Augments can be applied to most basic types of gear. Apply an $(l:amethyst_imbuement:equipment_augments)Equipment$() or $(l:amethyst_imbuement:weapon_augments)Weapon$() augment.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/augment_c.text: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_common_augments)Some augments$() are common between Imbued Jewelry and Totems. Check them out and imbue one.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/augment_j.text: Imbue an augment that is $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_jewelry_augments)specific to Imbued Jewelry$(). Addons can add more jewelry that accepts augments, keep an eye out!

amethyst_imbuement:progression/augment_t.text: Imbue a totem with an Augment $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinket_totem_augments)specific to Totems$().
